synonym: zicharevi

: 17 (variety of validiuscula ); 1930 b: 324 (subspecies of validiuscula );

: 119 .

Host plant(s) within Iran .
Alnus
sp.,
Populus
sp.,
Juglans
sp. (
Adeli 1972
); alder (
Alnus
sp., Betulaceae ), oriental plane (
Platanus orientalis
, Platanaceae ), poplar, white mulberry (
Morus alba
, Moraceae ), walnut (
Juglans regia
, Juglandaceae ), willow (
Salix
sp., Salicaceae ) (
Farahbakhsh 1960
;
Modarres Awal 1997
);
Alnus
spp.,
Juglans
spp., *
Pistacia
spp.,
Platanus orientalis
,
Populus
spp.,
Salix
spp., sapwood, roots and trunk (
Abai & Adeli 1984
).
Distribution within Iran .
Kerman (
Abai & Adeli 1984
), Generally distributed (
Abai & Adeli 1984
;
Modarres Awal 1997
), northern Iran (
Davatchi et al . 1959
;
Richter 1952
;
Adeli 1972
;
Abai & Adeli 1984
), Iran (no locality cited) (Kubáň 2006 ;
Bellamy 2008 b
).

Note. The record for
Pistacia
in Kerman (
Abai & Adeli 1984
) is very doubtful; the record for
Alnus (
Modarres Awal 1997
)
may refer to the following species.

occurring in adjacent Armenia and Azerbaijan .
